sentences.en: As we discuss in the next section, this lack of trust directs the group toward rigorously detailed contracts and specifications.
sentences.cn: 正如我们下一节的讨论，这种缺乏信任将导致组织严酷地细化合同和规格。

sentences.en: At a high level, we apply authentication and authorization rigorously.
sentences.cn: 在高级别上，我们严格应用身份验证和授权。

sentences.en: But no rigorously controlled studies have confirmed these effects.
sentences.cn: 不过以上效应还未经严格控制的研究加以证实.

sentences.en: During those periods, safety measures shall be adopted and rigorously administered.
sentences.cn: 在草原防火期间, 应当采取安全措施,严格管理.

sentences.en: Geometry is developed rigorously from a postulational base.
sentences.cn: 从公设的基础上严谨地推演几何学.

sentences.en: Has rigorously, the earnest work manner.
sentences.cn: 具有严谨, 认真的工作态度.

sentences.en: He had been trained rigorously by the monks.
sentences.cn: 他接受过修道士的严格训练.

sentences.en: He questioned Winifred rigorously until she could assure him that the money had been sent.
sentences.cn: 他严辞诘问过维妮佛利德,非要她再三说已经把钱汇了出去,才算放心.

sentences.en: How rigorously the test will be applied in future cases is unclear.
sentences.cn: 现在还不清楚在将来的案例中,对这种检验的运用能严厉到何种程度.

sentences.en: In his rigorously honest and orderly mind he probably had contempt for mere politicians.
sentences.cn: 他心地至诚而严守纪律,瞧不起空头政治家.

sentences.en: In physics events ase explained rigorously and quantitativly, and with the aid of mathematical formulae.
sentences.cn: 在物理学中,可借助数学公式对事件作出严格的定量说明.

sentences.en: Public surveys in China aren't always rigorously scientific.
sentences.cn: 中国的公共调查并不总是十分科学.

sentences.en: Rigorously tested, this landing gear will withstand incredible loads.
sentences.cn: 严格考核, 这将起落架载荷经受不可思议.

sentences.en: Routine use of sedation should be rigorously avoided.
sentences.cn: 应极力避免常规使用镇静剂.

sentences.en: She was a rigorously chaste woman.
The heroine of the play is rigorously chaste.
sentences.cn: 这出戏的女主角可真节烈.

sentences.en: The rigorously guaranty building quality is most important in RC structures.
sentences.cn: 为了达到加固的目的,必须严格保证施工质量.

sentences.en: You then can a multi-group either diffusion equation or solve these types of equations and more rigorously.
sentences.cn: 然后你有一个多群的或者是扩散等式,或者更严厉地解决这些等式。

words.tran_cn: 严格的，严厉的；严密的；严酷的
严格地；坚硬地；严厉地；牢牢地
